A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What is it with SW movies that makes critics soil their pants in fear before giving them a bad review? This movie is Bad with capital B. The script is a mess\, the characters have the emotional depth of an 8 year old and half of the movie is filler that has absolutely no impact in the final outcome. The action scenes are OK I guess\, I mean\, it´s competently directed and all\, production quality is good...  but that is a given for a 500million dollar production\, isn´t it? At this point I´m ready to believe that critics will give positive reviews to anything that has the star wars score\, and people waving glow sticks at each other. That is how low the bar has been set.
